attributes.action: BBC to have live instant poetry
attributes.additional_details:
As a poet in the modern day.
The BBC don't have a single poet.
I have to say.
I have sent over 100 emails it is true.
Plus i have made over 20 videos
for all to see.
just youtube my name
brian loughborough
To see me doing live poetry.
They pay middle class people to recite poetry.
So why can they not employ me.

rejection.details: One for the BBC to answer.
